entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:36 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 2:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: WSW 41 km/h gust 81 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:38 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 2:38 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
